about_the_game:
Content included:



  • Compilation of conversations in English
  • Compilation of conversations in Spanish
  • 2 illustrations in 4K resolution

Aeterna Chronicles: Memento Mori is the compilation of all the conversations between the King of Darkness and Your Deathness during the adventures of the cursed monarch through the sprouted worlds of Summum Aeterna.

Philosophical debates, memories of the distant past, dialogues that range from the most absurd to the metaphysical... Two of the most brilliant minds of the Aeterna Universe face each other in a deep but also funny dialectical contest.

We hope you laugh at the crazy ideas of these two old friends as much as we do. Only through these pages can you understand the complex mind of the cursed monarch and the Grim Reaper.
